long_description: Remember the adventure, not the bugs, when you wear the women's ExOfficio Bugsaway Damselfly Jacket. The treated polyester fabric dries fast, breathes and repels a multitude of insects. 100% polyester mini-mesh body with woven paneling is lightweight and perfect for travel. BugsAway Insect Shield(R) clothing repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin, which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant. Elastic bungee cords on hood gives you good coverage yet won't impede peripheral vision. Elastic cuffs feel comfortable and can be pushed up. Zippered hand pockets secure essentials. ExOfficio Bugsaway Damselfly Jacket packs into one of its own zip pockets. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes.
short_description: Remember the adventure, not the bugs, when you wear the women's ExOfficio Bugsaway Damselfly Jacket. The treated polyester fabric dries fast, breathes and repels a multitude of insects.
